\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w know|strong="G1492"\w*, O \w Philippians|strong="G5374"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w beginning|strong="G0746"\w* \w of|strong="G3056"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w gospel|strong="G2098"\w*, \w when|strong="G3753"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w departed|strong="G1831"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w Macedonia|strong="G3109"\w*, \w no|strong="G3762"\w* \w church|strong="G1577"\w* communicated \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w me|strong="G1473"\w* \w as|strong="G1519"\w* concerning \w giving|strong="G1394"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w receiving|strong="G3028"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w only|strong="G3441"\w*:
